ðŸ“– Summary: Nezha is a self-hosted, lightweight monitoring tool designed for servers and websites. It provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities, including system status, HTTP/TCP services, and ping, along with push alerts and scheduled task execution. Additionally, it offers a web terminal for convenient server management.
